players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Bob was killed. Vote her out. Diana, we’re safe."
You: "I didn't kill Bob, maybe you mis-identified me. I'm a villager. Vote Diana."
Diana: "Charlie, I trust your investigation. Alice claims innocence but only mafia can kill Bob. Vote Alice to stop her."
Diana: "Charlie, your investigation of Alice seems off; she denies killing Bob and blames me. As a villager, I see this as a typical mafia lie. Vote Charlie."
You: "Charlie, I didn't kill Bob; maybe you mis-identified me. I suspect Diana might be mafia. Vote her."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice; she’s mafia. She killed Bob. Vote her. I’m detective and safe. Diana, you can’t blame me."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.

Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Bob was killed. Vote her out. Diana, we’re safe."
Alice: "I didn't kill Bob, maybe you mis-identified me. I'm a villager. Vote Diana."
Diana: "Charlie, I trust your investigation. Alice claims innocence but only mafia can kill Bob. Vote Alice to stop her."
Diana: "Charlie, your investigation of Alice seems off; she denies killing Bob and blames me. As a villager, I see this as a typical mafia lie. Vote Charlie."
Alice: "Charlie, I didn't kill Bob; maybe you mis-identified me. I suspect Diana might be mafia. Vote her."
You: "I investigated Alice; she’s mafia. She killed Bob. Vote her. I’m detective and safe. Diana, you can’t blame me."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
